-e ---

# 𒀭𒌍 sin

𒌍 (ušu₃ /ušu/) thirty, 30
𒐈 (eš₅ /eš/, “three” + 𒌋 (u, “ten”, i.e. 3×10

𒌗 «Sîn» "Iti" Moon 𒀭𒌍 𒀭𒂗𒍪 জোন zün जुन jun ଜହ୍ନ jôhnô

𒌍 𒌋𒌋 sinniš gynes women <> yin 阴

𒌍𒈦 ušu®(maš) usur(pator) posser "power"

𒉆 SÍN "sin" 𒉆𒋳𒂵 SÍN-tag-ga Sündigen

Sumerograms BA₃, EŠ, UŠU₃
Phonetic values eš
Logogram 𒌍 BA₃ Akkadogram of amūtum “sheep liver”
